Added methods 'requireEditable(TableCell)' and 'requireNotEditable(TableCell)' to org.fest.swing.fixture.JTableFixture.
Added methods 'requireEditable()' and 'requireNotEditable()' to org.fest.swing.fixture.JTableCellFixture.
Added methods 'startEditing(),' 'stopEditing(),' 'cancelEditing(),' 'editor(),' and 'enterValue(String)' to org.fest.swing.fixture.JTableCellFixture.
Added methods 'findAll(ComponentMatcher)' and 'findAll(Container, ComponentMatcher)' to org.fest.swing.core.ComponentFinder to look up all the components that match certain search criteria.
Fixed mapping of character '+' to a key stroke in org.fest.swing.keystroke.KeyStrokeMappingProvider_en.
Fixed multiple selection in JListDriver, JTableDriver and JTreeDriver.
Fixed implementation of 'selectItems(JList, int, int)' in org.fest.swing.driver.JListDriver.
All fixtures now throw IllegalArgumentException if any constructor argument is null (with the exception of the name of the component to look up.)
JMenuItemFixture now supports the screen menu bar in Mac OS.
Fixed bug in org.fest.swing.core.RobotFixture. Closing a window that is not shown resulted in an ActionFailedException.
Renamed methods 'slideToMax' and 'slideToMin' in JSliderFixture to 'slideToMaximum' and 'slideToMinimum' respectively.
Added class 'org.fest.swing.launcher.ApplicationLauncher' to start application from the 'main' method.

Removed methods 'increment' and 'decrement' in JSliderFixture. These methods were not communicating their intention properly and are not needed since JSliderFixture has methods 'slideToMaximum' and 'slideToMinimum'.
Added method 'controlOrCommandMask' to org.fest.swing.util.Platform.
Added method 'pressAndReleaseKey(KeyPressInfo)' to all component fixtures.
Added method 'selectPaths(String...)' and 'selectRows(int...)' to JTreeFixture.

Method 'requireSelection(String)' and 'requireSelection(row)' in JTreeFixture now take an array as argument to verify multi-selection in a JTree. The new signatures are 'requireSelection(String...)' and 'requireSelection(int...)' respectively.

Created JTableCellReader (with default implementation BasicJTableCellReader) which reads the value of a cell in a JTable. BasicJTableCellReader supports JLabels, JComboBoxes and JCheckBoxes as cell renderers of a JTable.
Added methods 'fontAt(TableCell)', 'backgroundAt(TableCell)' and 'foregroundAt(TableCell)' to JTableFixture to verify the font, background and foreground of an specific cell in a JTable.
Added methods 'font()', 'background()' and 'foreground()' to JTableCellFixture to verify the font, background and foreground of an specific cell in a JTable.
Fixed NullPointerException in method 'enterText' in org.fest.core.RobotFixture.
Added method 'selection' to JListFixture. This method returns the String representation of the selection of a JList.

Introduced 'JListCellReader' to read values from JLists. Users can implement their own JListCellReaders when using custom cell renderers in JLists. After creating a JListCellRendering, users only need to pass an instance to method 'cellReader(JListCellReader)' in JListFixture.
Fixed regression. JToolBarFixture extends ComponentFixture.
Created JComboBoxCellReader and BasicJComboBoxReader to support custom cell renderers in JComboBoxFixture.
Created JTreeCellReader and BasicJTreeReader to support custom cell renderers in JTreeFixture.
Added method 'requireNoSelection' to JComboBoxFixture, JListFixture, JTableFixture and JTreeFixture.
JTreeFixture now scrolls (up or down) to the row or path to select, drag or drop.
Added method 'contents' to JTableFixture. This method returns the String representation of the cell values of a JTable.
Added method 'requireContents(String[][])' to JTableFixture.
Component finders (WindowFinder, JFileChooserFinder and JOptionPaneFinder) can perform lookups using GenericTypeMatchers. Many thanks to Mariusz Saternus.
Added method 'font' to all fixtures. This method returns a FontFixture.
Added method 'background' to all fixtures. This method returns a ColorFixture.
Added method 'foreground' to all fixtures. This method returns a ColorFixture.
Renamed method 'selectionContents' to 'selectionValue' in JTableFixture.
Renamed method 'contentAt' to 'valueAt' in JTableFixture. This change was made to keep name consistency between JComboBoxFixture, JListFixture and JTableFixture.
Added method 'requireValue(String)' to JTableCellFixture.
Added method 'requireSelection(String)' to JTreeFixture. This method verifies that a JTree has the given path selected. The path is specified as a String, for example "root/node1/node1.1".
Added method 'requireSelection(int)' to JTreeFixture. This method verifies that a JTree has the row selected.
Added methods 'showPopupMenuAt(int)' and 'showPopupMenuAt(String)' to JTreeFixture. These methods show a JPopupMenu in a given row and node path respectively.
Replaced TreePath as method parameter in JTreeFixture with a String specifying the path. For example, now a path can be set as "root/node1/node1.1".
Added methods 'selectAllText' and 'replaceText(String)' to JComboBoxFixture.
Replaced constants that indicate the operating system with methods in org.fest.swing.util.Platform.
Eliminated some project dependencies. FEST-Swing now depends on FEST-Assert, FEST-Reflect and FEST-Util only.
Fixed regression. JPanelFixture extends ComponentFixture.
Fixed regression. JInternalFrameFixture extends ComponentFixture.
Renamed method names that start with 'mouse' in org.fest.swing.core.Robot. For example, method 'mouseMove' is now 'moveMouse'. This change was done to keep method naming consistency.
Added method 'pressModifiers(int)' and 'releaseModifiers(int)' to org.fest.swing.core.Robot.
Added methods 'focus(Component)' and 'focusAndWaitForFocusGain(Component)' to org.fest.swing.core.Robot.
Fixed JListDriver and JTableDriver to scroll to the item to select, drag or drop.
Selecting items in JComboBox now scroll drop-down list to get to the item to select.
Added method 'tableHeader' to JTableFixture. This method returns a JTableHeaderFixture.
Added JTableHeaderFixture to test instances of JTableHeader.
Made methods of class org.fest.core.Settings not static. To set a particular setting, an instance of Settings should be retrieved from a Robot.

Added methods 'includeHierarchyIfComponentNotFound' and 'includeHierarchyIfComponentNotFound(boolean)' to org.fest.swing.core.ComponentFinder to indicate if the component hierarchy should be included in a ComponentLookupException thrown when a component cannot be found.
Added method 'component' to ComponentFixture. It returns the GUI component in a fixture.
Added methods 'requireEditable' and 'requireNotEditable' to JComboBoxFixture, JTextComponentFixture and JTreeFixture.
Added method 'requireNoJOptionPaneIsShowing' to RobotFixture.
Renamed ComponentPrinter to BasicComponentPrinter (in package org.fest.swing.core). Introduced interface ComponentPrinter.
Renamed ComponentFinder to BasicComponentFinder (in package org.fest.swing.core). Introduced interface ComponentFinder.
Moved methods from org.fest.swing.util.Swing to org.fest.swing.util.AWT. Deleted class org.fest.swing.util.Swing.
Created interface org.fest.swing.core.Robot and made RobotFixture implement it, to facilitate unit testing.
Added method 'showPopupMenuAt(String)' to JListFixture.
Updated dependency versions: fest-assert-0.9.1, fest-reflect-0.3, fest-util-0.3.
Due to the introduction of component drivers, fest-reflect is a required, compile-time dependency.
All component formatters in org.fest.swing.formatter display the properties 'visible' and 'showing'.
ComponentFinderTemplate uses the specified name to find a component.
Fixed constructors in ContainerFixture to use lookup scope from org.fest.swing.core.Settings.
Added method 'click(TableCell, MouseButton)' to JTableFixture.
Added method 'click(TableCell, MouseClickInfo)' to JTableFixture.
Added method 'scrollTo(int)' to JScrollBarFixture.
Added method 'found' to ComponentLookupException. This method returns all the GUI components found when looking up for a single component.
Moved methods 'showPopupMenu' and 'findActivePopupMenu' from org.fest.swing.core.RobotFixture to org.fest.swing.driver.JPopupMenuDriver.
Added method 'pressAndReleaseKey(int keyCode, int modifiers)' to org.fest.swing.core.RobotFixture.

Added the following component drivers to replace Abbot's testers: ComponentDriver, ContainerDriver, FrameDriver, JComboBoxDriver, JComponentDriver, JInternalFrameDriver, JListDriver, JMenuItem, JPopupMenu, JScrollBarDriver, JSliderDriver, JSpinnerDriver, JTabbedPane, JTable, JTextComponentDriver, JToolBarDriver, JTreeDriver. Component drivers are intended for internal use only.
Added method 'enterText(String)' to class org.fest.swing.core.RobotFixture.
Added method 'timeoutToFindPopup' to class org.fest.swing.core.Settings. This method sets the number of milliseconds to wait before failing to find a pop-up menu that should appear.
Added method 'click(Component, Point)' to org.fest.swing.core.RobotFixture.
Added several constants to org.fest.swing.core.Settings that indicate the operating system the tests are running on (e.g. 'IS_WINDOWS', 'IS_OS_X', etc.)
Renamed method 'robotAutoDelay' to 'delayBetweenEvents' in class org.fest.swing.core.Settings.
Added method 'timeoutToBeVisible' to class org.fest.swing.core.Settings. This method sets the the number of milliseconds to wait for a component to be visible.
Fixed bug in which IntrospectionComponentFormatter could show the value of the property 'showing'.
Renamed method 'menuItem(String...)' in ContainerFixture to 'menuItemWithPath(String...)'.
Added global setting 'componentLookupScope' (in class Settings) to configure scope of component lookup (in fixtures only.)
Added enum ComponentLookupScope to configure component lookup to consider showing components only.
Added JScrollBarFixture and JScrollPaneFixture.
Component lookup using a org.fest.swing.core.ComponentFinder now throws ComponentLookupException if more than one component matching the given search criteria is found.
Moved 'print' methods from org.fest.swing.core.ComponentFinder to the new class org.fest.swing.core.ComponentPrinter.
Added NameAndTypeMatcher to lookup GUI components by name and type.
Added method 'printer()' to RobotFixture. This method returns a ComponentPrinter using the same component hierarchy as the RobotFixture.
ComponentFinders now match components if 'isShowing()' is true, instead of checking for 'isVisible()'.
When components are not found, the message in the thrown ComponentLookupException now includes list of Components in the hierarchy.
Added methods 'printComponents(PrintStream, Container)' and 'printComponents(PrintStream, Class, Container)' to ComponentFinder.
Added 'toString' implementation to org.fest.swing.core.NameMatcher to facilitate debugging.
Added 'toString' implementation to org.fest.swing.core.TypeMatcher to facilitate debugging.
Added 'toString' implementation to org.fest.swing.fixture.JMenuItemMatcher to facilitate debugging.
Added 'toString' implementation to org.fest.swing.fixture.JButtonMatcher to facilitate debugging.
Renamed methods 'wait' and 'delay' in RobotFixture to 'pause'. Then moved methods 'pause' to the new class Pause.
Added method 'robotAutoDelay' in class 'org.fest.swing.core.Settings' to configure test speed.
Added JInternalFrameFixture.
Added method 'moveTo(Point)' to FrameFixture and DialogFixture.
Added method 'requireValue(Object)' to JSpinnerFixture.
Added method 'increment(int)' to JSpinnerFixture.
Added method 'decrement(int)' to JSpinnerFixture.
Added class JListItemFixture. that knows how to simulate user input on a specific item of a JList.
Added method 'item(int)' and 'item(String)' to JListFixture. These methods return a JListItemFixture.
Added method 'showPopupMenuAt(Point)' to ComponentFixture (and therefore to all fixtures).
Removed unnecessary generic types in ItemGroupFixture, TextInputFixture and TextDisplayFixture.
Added method 'requireSelection(String)' to JComboBoxFixture.
Added method 'requireSelection(String)' to JListFixture.
Added method 'requireSelectedItems(String...)' to JListFixture.
Added method 'selectItems(int...)' to allow multiple-selection a JListFixture.
Added method 'selectItems(String...)' to allow multiple-selection a JListFixture.
Added method 'selectItems(Range.From, Range.To)' to allow selection of a range of items in a JListFixture.
Added methods 'okButton', 'cancelButton', 'yesButton' and 'noButton' to JOptionPaneFixture. These methods return a JButtonFixture wrapping the buttons in a JOptionPane

Added method 'panel' to class ContainerFixture. FrameFixture and DialogFixture can now lookup a JPanel (or subclass by type (if only one JPanel in the container,) by name or by custom search criteria.
Added method 'invokeAndWait(Runnable)' to RobotFixture.
Added method 'takeScreenshotOf' to class ScreenshotTaker. This method takes screenshots of a particular GUI component.
Added method 'saveComponentAsPng' to class ScreenshotTaker. This method takes screenshots of a particular GUI component and saves it as PNG.
Added method 'printComponents' (with overloaded version) to ComponentFinder.
Added method 'toggleButton' (and overloaded versions) to org.fest.swing.fixture.ContainerFixture.
Added org.fest.swing.fixture.JToggleButtonFixture to handle javax.swing.JToggleButton(s).
Renamed org.fest.swing.fixture.JToggleButtonFixture to org.fest.fixture.TwoStateButtonFixture.
Moved Ant task-related classes from the package 'org.fest.swing.junit' to 'org.fest.swing.junit.ant'.
Added support for taking screenshots of failing tests with JUnit inside an IDE.
Moved org.swing.fest.GUITest and org.fest.swing.util.GUITestFinder to package org.fest.swing.annotation.
Moved exception classes in package org.fest.swing to org.fest.swing.exception.
Moved classes in package org.fest.swing to org.fest.swing.core.
Renamed package org.fest.swing.fixture.util to org.fest.swing.finder.
Added method 'requireEnabled(Timeout)' to all component fixtures.
Added class JOptionPaneFinder to find a JOptionPane with timeout support.
Added factory method 'timeout(long, java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit)' to class org.fest.swing.core.Timeout.
Renamed method 'time' to 'duration' in class org.fest.swing.core.Timeout.
Renamed method 'checkbox' to 'checkBox' in ContainerFixture.

Added method 'click(Component, Point, MouseButton, int)' to RobotFixture. This method simulates a user clicking on the given component, at the specific point, with the given mouse button, the given number of times.
Added methods 'doubleClickItem(int)' and 'doubleClickItem(String)' to JListFixture.
Uploaded source attachments to Maven repository.
Added class JPanelFixture.
Moved ImageException and ScreenshotTaker from package org.fest.swing.util to package org.fest.swing.image.
Renamed org.fest.swing.util.GUITests to org.fest.swing.annotation.GUITestFinder.
Add timeout for RobotFixture.wait(Condition): RobotFixture.wait(Condition, Timeout).
Added method 'close' to WindowFixture (superclass of FrameFixture and DialogFixture).
Created class JFileChooserFinder.
Added methods 'radioButton' and 'table' to ContainerFixture (superclass of DialogFixture and FrameFixture).
Added static methods 'leftButton', 'middleButton' and 'rightButton' to MouseClickInfo.
Assertion failures in all fixtures now provide better feedback.
Added support for time delays in RobotFixture.
Added method 'pressAndReleaseKeys(int...)', 'pressAndReleaseKey(int)', and 'releaseKey(int)' to all fixtures.
Added method 'rightClick' to all fixtures.
Added method 'doubleClick' to all fixtures.
Added method 'click(MouseButton)' to all fixtures; this method simulates a user clicking the specified mouse button.
Added method 'click(MouseClickInfo)' to all fixtures; this method simulates a user clicking the specified mouse button, the specified number of times.
Added method 'showPopupMenu' to all fixtures. This method shows a pop-up menu on a component and returns a JPopupMenuFixture.
Replaced class JTableFixture.Cell with TableCell.
In JTableFixture, methods that used to take two int values as the row and column indices as arguments, now take a TableCell as argument.
Added method 'cell(TableCell)' to JTableFixture, which returns a fixture that can manage the specified table cell.
Added support for JPopupMenu, JRadioButton and JSplitPane.
Renamed method 'contents' to 'selectionContents' in JTableFixture.
Removed method testerCastedTo from ComponentFixture.
Added drag 'n drop support for JList, JTable and JTree.
Added support for custom matchers for component lookup. This feature is useful when testing GUI components that don't have an associated name (e.g. testing legacy applications.)
Added utility class Platform, which contains platform-specific utility methods.
ContainerFixture now recognizes JFileChooserFixture and JListFixture.
Support for testing time-consuming tasks
Swing module and the extensions for TestNG and JUnit are included in one zip file.
Now it is possible to embed screenshots of failing GUI tests in JUnit's HTML report.
Added support for more Swing components: JTable, JSpinner, JSlider and JFileChooser.
Separated the TestNG and JUnit extensions (screenshots of failing tests) into their own separate projects.
Added class ScreenLock to guarantee real sequential execution of GUI tests, regardless of the testing framework being used (JUnit or TestNG.)
Added capability to add a screenshot of the desktop to a TestNG HTML test report when a test fails.
Added support for testing JTrees.
Replaced prefix 'should' with 'require' in fixture assertions to make API more concise (e.g. method 'shouldBeVisible' is now 'requireVisible.')
Renamed method 'shouldHaveThisText' to 'requireText' in interface TextDisplayFixture.
Removed prefix 'find' from methods in ContainerFixture (e.g. method 'findLabel' is now 'label.')
Added Maven 2 tasks for Ant for dependency management.
Created a Maven 2 pom.xml file for Abbot.
Created a Maven 2 local repository containing all FEST dependencies. This way, it is not necessary to download any dependency from a remote Maven repository when building FEST.
Added module fest-reflect, which provides a 'fluent interface' that simplifies the usage of Java reflection.
